entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 7:05 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 7:05 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
